abstract: Apple is making more than $1 billion in quarterly profit from a product line it didn’t even sell two years ago.
snippet: Apple is making more than $1 billion in quarterly profit from a product line it didn’t even sell two years ago.
lead_paragraph: Apple generates so much hype and gratuitous superlatives that it can be hard to distinguish when it has done something that is truly remarkable. But going over what Apple said in its earnings release and conference call Tuesday, it’s clear that the dimensions of its cellphone business — its sales, profits and market share — deserve the strongest words of praise that can be summoned.

headline.main: Steve Jobs’s Home Run With the iPhone

abstract: AT&T’s relationship with Apple is paying off as sales of the iPhone 3G buoyed wireless revenue in third-quarter earnings.
snippet: AT&T’s relationship with Apple is paying off as sales of the iPhone 3G buoyed wireless revenue in third-quarter earnings.
lead_paragraph: AT&T’s successful relationship with Apple comes at a price: $900 million.

headline.main: Even AT&T Is Startled by Cost of iPhone Partnership
headline.print_headline: Even AT&T Is Startled by Cost of iPhone Partnership

abstract: Ipevo’s TR10 speakerphone, previously made for Skype users only, has been introduced for iChat.
snippet: Ipevo’s TR10 speakerphone, previously made for Skype users only, has been introduced for iChat.
lead_paragraph: It’s a frustration that vexes many Apple users. Some products just aren’t made for Macs. Until now, Ipevo’s TR10 speakerphone was on that list.

headline.main: Finally, a Speakerphone Made Just for Macs (Eat Your Heart Out, PC Fans)
headline.print_headline: Finally, a Speakerphone Made Just for Macs (Eat Your Heart Out, PC Fans)

abstract: The Toshiba Portégé R600 laptop is 0.77 inches thick and a lightweight 2.4 pounds, and still includes a DVD-SuperMulti drive.
snippet: The Toshiba Portégé R600 laptop is 0.77 inches thick and a lightweight 2.4 pounds, and still includes a DVD-SuperMulti drive.
lead_paragraph: With all eyes on Apple last week, some other noteworthy product introductions did not get their fair share of fanfare. Take the Toshiba Portégé R600 laptop.

headline.main: A Lightweight Successor Packs a Portable Punch
headline.print_headline: A Lightweight Successor Packs a Portable Punch
